user.name: Peter H. Diamandis, MD
user.description: Exec. Chairman @XPRIZE @fountainlife_hq (and others) Working to extend human healthspan.

fullText:
HARD TRUTH: AI is unstoppable.

The only choice we have is to steer it in the right direction.
